game.name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific F3 Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In the history of American locomotives few diesels are more famous nor left a greater legacy than the Electro-Motive F3. Successor to the landmark EMD FT & the first of the fabled “F-units” rated at 1,500 horsepower, the F3 went to work for over 50 U.S. railroads across the breadth of the continent.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In the history of American locomotives few diesels are more famous nor left a greater legacy than the Electro-Motive F3. Successor to the landmark EMD FT & the first of the fabled “F-units” rated at 1,500 horsepower, the F3 went to work for over 50 U.S. railroads across the breadth of the continent.
